entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the headmaster who is concerned about Professor Lupin's safety and offers him a potion. He is also described as cheerful but slightly raised voice.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as having a conversation with Professor Trelawney about crystal gazing. She is described as dryly saying 'Imagine that'.

entities.name: trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is mentioned as having a conversation with Professor McGonagall about crystal gazing. She is described as shrieking loudly at the end of Christmas dinner.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is mentioned as being in no immediate danger according to Dumbledore. Snape has made a potion for him again.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as having made the potion for Professor Lupin again. He responds to Dumbledore's question with 'Yes, Headmaster'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as getting up from the table first along with Ron after Christmas dinner. He is described as going furiously red on being addressed directly by Dumbledore.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as getting up from the table first along with Harry after Christmas dinner.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is concerned about Professor Lupin's safety and offers him a potion.
Snape has made the potion for Professor Lupin again.
Harry and Ron got up from the table first along with each other after Christmas dinner.
